Articles.Content:
Title basically says it all, parts with interiors!

Let's say you have finally created the Space Station of your dreams orbiting around Kerbin, I don't know about you but I get really disappointed in the fact that there is an interior for the cockpits and all but if you want to move your Kerbal to another point in the Space Station you have to go EVA all the time.

So the idea in a nutshell is to have an option to actually move around inside your station from one point to another. This idea creates a whole new concept on the game, where we can have beds, toilets and other decorative things inside of the parts you've built, pretty much like the cockpit/modules,etc. Oh, and don't forget the automatic round doors .

Ps: Read on the "Already suggested things", mentioned Building Interiors, I don't suppose this is included .

It is on the Do-Not-Suggest list though, as "Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets" under Flight.

The lists are sooo long... I suppose that's a good thing?
In the mean time you can use the crew manifest mod to move kerbals between sections without going EVA.

Yep, this one is on the what not to suggest list, it's been suggested often enough

That said, thread locked.
